title: Large 2 bed, 1.5 baths, includes heat/hot water, 1 pkg.
posting_body: Spacious renovated unit on 2nd floor in brick building,
includes heat/hot water and a parking space.
New kitchen appliances, wall to wall, 1.5 baths.
Walk to parks by the river, restaurants, shops, etc.
Good credit and monthly employment required.
There is a real estate fee of $2,500.
Leave me your email address for photos and tell me a bit about yourself
Please reference: 2 bedroom $2,500 Newton in your text or message Thank you
